verbs.description: small brown worms in toilets if [ARG0: you] [V: walk] [ARGM-DIR: into your bathroom] and spot small brown worms swimming around in your toilet then your bowl is likely housing either horsehair worms or drain fly larvae although windows gordius spp parasitize psychoda spp
